title: 1.2rc5 build on linux/amd64/gcc4.6.3 test reports incorrect output on rotate2.go
body:
On Linux/amd64 under ubuntu 12.04 with gcc (Ubuntu/Linaro 4.6.3-1ubuntu5) 4.6.3, I'm not
successful in building go1.2rc5 from source, as a test that ran as a part of all.bash
failed:

...
k-nucleotide
k-nucleotide-parallel
mandelbrot
meteor-contest
pidigits
threadring
chameneosredux

# ../test/bench/go1
ok      _/usr/local/go1.2rc5/go/test/bench/go1  4.159s

# ../test
go run run.go -- rotate2.go
runoutput            rotate2.go          : incorrect output
go build command-line-arguments: signal: killed

exit status 1

real    2m28.867s
user    2m46.546s
sys     2m18.417s
